basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Michael Metzger Memorial Endowed Scholarship for MSBA

description: The Dr. Michael Metzger Memorial Endowed Scholarship for MSBA is open to graduate applicants admitted for graduate studies in the Master of Science in Business Analytics (MSBA) program. Students must have earned a minimum 3.0 GPA in their undergraduate coursework to qualify. Students must write an essay describing their plan for completing the MSBA degree for his/her career upon graduation. Students must demonstrate evidence of financial need. Two faculty recommendations required (please indicate the two College of Business faculty members on your application that you wish to have supply a recommendation). This scholarship may only be used for tuition, books, and fees. Students must attach both an undergraduate and graduate transcript. May only be used for tuition, books and fees. Eligibility Requirements Admitted for graduate studies in the Master of Science in Business Analytics (MSBA) program Minimum GPA of 3.0 or higher in their undergraduate work Undergraduates must have completed 60 hours of credit at the time of application Complete essay describing their plan for completing the MSBA degree for his/her career upon graduation Demonstrate evidence of financial need Provide two faculty recommendations (please indicate the two College of Business faculty members on your application that you wish to have supply a recommendation) Undergraduate Transcript and Graduate Transcript Award Requirements May only be used for tuition, books and fees
